title: Regulation (EEC) No 234/71 of the Council of 1 February 1971 deleting certain products from the Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 2603/69 establishing common rules for exports
header:
REGULATION (EEC) No 234/71 OF THE COUNCIL  of 1 February 1971  deleting certain products from the Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 2603/69 establishing common rules for exports
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The products listed in the Annex to this Regulation shall be deleted from the Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 2603/69.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 1 February 1971.
For the Council
The President
M. SCHUMANN  1OJ No L 324, 27.12.1969, p. 25.
ANNEX
